commitResults.messageTitle: Implement Greet Echo Exit
Store past inputs in array add list command to print all past inputs
Fix bug where only a single word is passed into the callback method.
Add Task class to represent a task. Update Duke class to store input as tasks Add command for toggling task done state.
Add ToDo, Deadline, Event subclasses of Task Change the input handling to treat all input as a single word command followed by an arbitrary input string.
Properly strip all input strings add test cases
Implement and use DukeException
use ArrayList instead of array for tasks
Add the delete command update tests
Add more tests
Convert commands to enum
Add storage class for saving and loading tasks.
commitResults.messageBody:
- handles conversion from list of tasks to string and back.
- saves and loads tasks from data/tasks.txt.
- does nothing if file doesn't exist.

Modify Task class to support encoding/decoding Task into a string.

- update subclasses of Task.java based on updated interface.

Update Duke class to load and save tasks to disk.

- load tasks from disk on start.
- save tasks when any tasks modified/added/deleted.
- does nothing if file cannot be created.

Update runtest.bat to remove old tasks.txt file when testing.

commitResults.messageTitle: Teach Duke to understand date and time command
commitResults.messageBody:
- Update Deadline to take in date and time in specific dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm format
- update input and Expected output

commitResults.messageTitle: Add basic gradle support - build.gradle from cs2103t repo add-gradle-support branch. - checkstyle files from se-education intermediate repo.
Improve directory structure, use packages Update build.gradle to use updated package structure
Update runtest.bat to use updated packages
Refactor ArrayList<Task> to standalone TaskList class - Handle storage saving / loading from files. - handle add / delete / toggle completion for tasks.
Extract some display code to Ui class.
commitResults.messageBody:
- welcome message, hi and bye message, generic loading error message.
- TODO: extract more error messages into Ui class

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve the use of OOP in code
commitResults.messageBody:
- Update Duke.java run method to follow provided format.
- Extract commands into individual classes.
- Update Ui class to add more useful display methods - e.g. showLine, showError, readCommand.
- Remove some unnecessary error handling in TaskList
- Update runtest.bat to use updated directory structure.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement unit tests for some methods.
commitResults.messageBody:
- override equals for all commands / tasks
- fix nullptr exception in TaskList

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement Find command - implement toString for TaskList for reusability - implement constructor for TaskList without storage
Reformat files based on checkstyle.
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add Javadocs to fix checkstyle errors.
- change ui indent to use tabs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add java docs for public methods.
Fix coding style for javadocs - improve header comments description
Add basic gui using javafx.
commitResults.messageBody: Based on part 1 and 2 of the javafx guide.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix unicode symbol representation to be displayed on the gui.
Represent the user and duke speech as Message objects.
commitResults.messageBody:
- contains the text, user (duke or user) and whether the program should be quit.
- update all commands to output this message object and remove direct ui manipulation from commands.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add gui using fxml following the javafx tutorial part 4
commitResults.messageBody:
Add Launcher as the main entry point to the program

Remove run loop from Duke, and replace with callback function that sends message in Ui.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix issues not adhering to coding standard.
commitResults.messageBody:
- javadoc statements should include newline after description and end with period
- add space between imports from different packages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix coding standard issues with import order and separation.
Fix checkstyle issues in test files.
